likes.text: “How have you found this lockdown as a new mother? My son was born in January, so it feels like I have been in a bubble for a while now.”
likes.name: Debra P.

likes.text: “After having a baby I found that simple moments with family and friends was the best medicine, especially when feeling tired and adjusting to a new rhythm. “After having a baby I found that simple moments with family and friends was the best medicine, especially when feeling tired and adjusting to a new rhythm.”
likes.name: Natalia N.

likes.text: “Having their company or watching your child be loved and cared for by the people who are most important to you is a beautiful.”
likes.name: Jenna K.

accordion.question: Who, how and where makes the toys?
accordion.answer: We make toys from the wood which grows in our region. Our carpenters are working in the third generation. They used to make matryoshka dolls before, and now they work with us. All materials for the toys we buy in Russia, except for the German paint. The cotton bags for toys packing are sewn by mothers of many children, who are on their maternity leave and work from home.

accordion.question: Are the toys safe to play?
accordion.answer: We use only solid wood and non-toxic water-based eco paint. The paint is approved for the age +0. We recommend children under three years old to play under parents supervision, as they may bite small particles of the wood.

accordion.question: Do the toys have a smell?
accordion.answer: Our paint doesn’t smell at all. Linseed oil which we use for natural toys smells like linseed oil. The toys have a very delicate and pleasant natural smell of wood or oil.

accordion.question: Why aren’t your toys smooth?
accordion.answer: Our toys are tactile. We never cover them with lacque, as it may contain harmful composition. After the surface is lacque, you can’t feel the texture of the wood. Our toys are velvety in touch, this helps to develop fine motor skills and to satisfy a child's tactile hunger. They are very comfortable and safe to play and leave no splinters on little hands.

accordion.question: What is the toys’ duration period?
accordion.answer: If you take proper care of them, you will be able to present them to your grandchildren. As the toys are made of solid wood, keep them away from heating batteries or humidifiers. They are perfect for playing, but you should never use stackers or building sets as teething toys for your children. The toys are safe, but it is possible to bite small particles of the wood. Their solid parts (blocks, stacker rings etc.) are very durable, but the glued smaller details (a kettle lid, tomato tops etc.) are more fragile. Though we use the strongest of all non-toxic eco glues, we don’t recommend you to throw the toys. Their fragility is a good way to teach a child to be careful with toys, clothes and the world around.

accordion.question: How to clean the toys?
accordion.answer: Wood is self-disinfecting and we cover the toys with paint or oil which protect them from dirt. You can use dry or wet cloth for cleaning, but do it gently, without rubbing and detergents.

accordion.question: How can wood manufacturing be eco-friendly, if trees are cut for it?
accordion.answer: We buy wood from responsible suppliers. They grow forests for logging themselves, and after they cut trees they plant new ones. We don’t buy wood from private traders who damage forests. We are also against wood wasting. We use wood with its natural marks, because they are beautiful. Wood can’t be homogeneous like plastic. It has its marks and we never throw such wood away.

shipping.heading: Order
shipping.info: We know that usually you make order while watching kids and doing extra 100 different things at the same time. So, please make sure that you put into the basket exactly the toys you wanted, and filled in address, name, telephone number and a ZIP-code correctly. All these things are essential for order to come as soon as possible.

shipping.heading: Shipping
shipping.info: We ship all orders by airmail from our workshop located in Russia. International airmail delivery takes from 2 to 8 weeks. Speed depends on how quickly it goes through customs and how efficient mail services work. We ship everywhere worldwide except for South Korea. In this country you can buy out toys at Lanasoly.

shipping.heading: Express delivery
shipping.info: For urgent orders we can offer UPS delivery. Send the list of the toys you want and your address to hello@raduga-grez.ru. We will calculate the cost of shipment and provide you with further details.

shipping.heading: Tracking
shipping.info: In 3 or 4 days after the shipment we will send you the tracking number, so you can have an eye on delivery status.

shipping.heading: Return
shipping.info: You can return toys during 14 days after delivery. Please send them back unused and in undamaged packaging. We will check toys and will return you the cost of toys. The condition of toys and the return shipment expense are the customer’s responsibility.

shipping.heading: Duties and taxes
shipping.info: There may be taxes and duties in your country when your order arrives. All duties and taxes in the receiving country paid by the customer.
